mapper.insert: INSERT INTO passengers ( product_no_dep, product_no_des, route_no_dep, route_no_des, passenger_name, first_name, last_name, gender, pin_type, birth, phone, email, user_pw ) VALUES ( #{productNoDep}, #{productNoDes}, #{routeNoDep}, #{routeNoDes}, #{passengerName}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{pinType}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{userPw} )

INSERT INTO booking ( name, user_no, user_no2, product_no, route_no, product_id, pas_count, round_trip, status, ticket_type ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{userNo}, #{userNo2}, #{productNo}, #{routeNo}, #{productId}, #{pasCount}, #{roundTrip}, #{status}, #{ticketType} )

INSERT INTO ticket ( passenger_no, passenger_name, departure, destination, departure_date, destination_date, departure_time, destination_time, duration, boarding, checked_in, is_boarded, route_no, seat_no, flight_no ) VALUES ( #{passengerNo}, #{passengerName}, #{departure}, #{destination}, #{departureDate}, #{destinationDate}, #{departureTime}, #{destinationTime}, #{duration}, #{boarding}, #{checked_in}, #{is_boarded}, #{routeNo}, #{flightNo} )
